title: DeWalt DCD778M2T-SFGB 18V 2 x 4.0Ah Li-Ion XR Brushless Cordless Combi Drill
description: Ergonomic combi drill with 18V brushless motor and XR technology. Features 13mm metal chuck, spindle lock, soft grip handle and LED light for workplace illumination. Suitable for consistent screwdriving into a variety of materials with different screw sizes. Supplied with TSTAK compatible carry case and 2 x 4.0Ah batteries with battery life indicators.

title: Evolution R165CCSL 1200W 165mm Electric Multi-Material Circular Saw 220-240V
description: High-powered and optimised using multi-material technology to cut mild steel, non-ferrous metals, wood, wood with embedded nails and plastic with a single blade. Balanced, lightweight and compact, delivering a maximum cutting depth of 53mm. Integrated dust blower allows optimum visibility along cutting line. Quick-adjust bevel lever and clear, debossed angle markings improves ease and accuracy of bevel cuts. Safety features include a lock-off switch, electronic blade brake and spindle lock for easy blade changes. Over-moulded handle improves ergonomics and comfort. Includes housing on-board tool storage for blade change hex key. Power cord length 3m. Supplied with 165mm TCT blade, hex key and parallel guide.

title: Stanley 8m Tape Measure 2 Pack
description: Highly accurate tape measures with metric and imperial scales. Features impact-resistant case, spring return mechanism and bi-material design for comfort and grip. Tylon blade coating for durability.

title: Site Heavy Duty Rubble Sacks 50Ltr 30 Pack
description: Reusable and made from 100% recycled material. Suitable for heavy building, DIY and garden refuse.

title: Irwin Jack 8tpi Wood Saw 20" (500mm)
description: Razor-sharp triple-ground teeth for cutting all materials. Cuts on the push and pull. Water-based lacquer gives up to 4 times more rust protection. Comfortable handle for prolonged use.

title: DeWalt ToughSystem 2 Storage Tower 3 Pcs
description: Storage system that protects tools from the toughest of site and weather conditions. Polypropylene construction with a visible IP65 water and dust seal. Features easy-to-use, time-saving latches for connecting modules together and a buckled lid with lockable plastic clamps. Supplied with an extendable / detachable handle and wheels for convenient transportation. Compatible with ToughSystem.

title: DeWalt DWST40603-1 Tool Belt Rig
description: Fully adjustable, padded belt to fit most sizes. With double-pin buckle fastening and constructed from high quality 1680 denier ballistic nylon. Designed to withstand the toughest of jobsite conditions with yellow hi-vis internal fabric for optimum visibility. Includes pouches, hammer loops and slots for storage.

title: TPI 725L Combustible Gas Detector
description: Battery-powered, one-handed, combustible gas leak detector/sniffer with flexi-neck for hard to reach areas. Ideal for pin-pointing the source of a leak with the easy to use single button zeroing feature that provides instant response.

title: DeWalt DCS355N-XJ 18V Li-Ion XR Brushless Cordless Oscillating Multi-Tool - Bare
description: Oscillating multi-tool with brushless motor delivering up to 57% more run time over DeWalt brushed motors. All-metal gearing for improved durability and performance. Lightweight for easy handling and dual-grip, variable speed trigger provides ultimate speed and application control. Quick-Change accessory system allows blade and attachments to be swapped without the use of tools. Bright LED light illuminates dark work surfaces for accurate cutting. Includes universal accessory adaptor for use with most brands of oscillating tool accessory. Supplied with 29 piece cutting and sanding accessory set.

title: Roughneck Log Splitter Set 3 Pieces
description: A complete set for chopping and splitting logs. Comprises 6lb splitting maul, 20oz hand axe and wood grenade.

title: Flomasta Type 22 Double-Panel Double Convector Radiator 600mm x 1200mm White 6998BTU
description: Traffic white paint finish (RAL 9016).

title: Danfoss RAS-C² White Angled Thermostatic TRV & Lockshield 15mm x 1/2"
description: Offers frost protection. Positive shut-off.

title: Google Nest 3rd Gen Pro Wireless Heating & Hot Water Smart Thermostat
description: Smart thermostat with energy-saving Auto-Schedule and TruRadiant technology, learns about the home and user temperature preferences to create a schedule, using energy only when needed to help save money. Features Home/Away assist which provides automatic adjustment to temperature and hot water if the home is empty.

title: Klima 825502 Intelligent Control Digital Electric Underfloor Heating Thermostat
description: Advanced, self-learning, digital clock thermostat with floor sensor. For programming electrical underfloor heating. Compatible with Klima electrical underfloor heating products.

title: Flomasta Twistloc Plastic Push-Fit Equal 90° Elbow 15mm 10 Pack
description: One-step, fully demountable and reusable. Combining push-fit and twist-locking technology to offer a secure, leak-free joint which incorporates pressure and combination systems. Suitable for plumbing, local / home hot water supply and central heating systems. Highly visible green band disappears when properly connected. Works with different piping materials such as copper, PB and PEX pipe, making it easy to combine different types of pipe for repairs or new installations.

title: Wednesbury Copper Pipe 15mm x 3m
description: Table X. Half hard.

title: FloPlast Half Round Gutter Black 112mm x 3m
description: High quality black uPVC system that is practical and easy to install.

title: FloPlast Push-Fit Plain-End Underground Drainage Pipe 110mm x 3m
description: Plain-ended. Silicone lubricant should be applied to the seals on any fittings and the pipe to help facilitate the joint.

title: Blyss WDH-316DB 16Ltr Dehumidifier
description: Ideal for removing excess moisture and controlling damp and condensation. Features automatic shut down, carry handle, LED display and reusable air filter. Suitable for rooms from 30 to 35m³.

title: Freestanding 9-Fin Oil-Filled Radiator 2000W
description: Oil-filled radiator with wheels for easy movement. Features 3 heat settings, adjustable thermostat and tip-over safety switch. Suitable for domestic and office environments.

title: LAP 13A 2-Gang SP Switched Socket + 3.1A 2-Outlet Type A USB Charger White
description: White moulded socket with 2 x USB charging ports. Features angled, in-line terminals and includes backed-out captive screws for easy installation. Ideal for charging iPads, iPhones, tablets, mobiles, cameras, MP3s and many more devices.

title: Masterplug IP54 Weatherproof Outdoor Box Kit
description: Power kit suitable for temporary outdoor applications. The IP54 weatherproof enclosure can house transformers, timers and other large plugs making it ideal for fairy lights and outdoor power connections. Supplied with 6m 4-gang extension lead, 24-hour timer and RCD adaptor.

title: Appleby 2-Gang Dry Lining Knockout Box 35mm
description: White, plastic dry lining box. For mounting electrics into dryline cavity walls.

title: Wago 41A Junction Box 39 x 108 x 44mm Grey
description: Multipurpose electrical junction enclosure with integrated, adjustable cable clamps. Designed for use with Wago 222 and 773 series connectors. Supports upto 6 cables. Fits through a 60mm dia. downlighter hole.

title: 13A 2-Gang SP Switched Metal Clad Socket with White Inserts
description: Rugged design with tough, durable, metal-clad finish.

title: LAP Modular Cat 6 RJ45 Ethernet Socket White
description: Flexible Cat 6 RJ45 outlet. Assemble with other products into a modular front plate to create a grid.

title: 13A Fused Heavy Duty Plug Black
description: Durable and hardwearing.

title: Masterplug TCM24-XD Mechanical Plug-In & Plug-Through Compact Timer
description: 240V / 13A. Makes it look like someone is home or turns lights and appliances on to welcome users home.

title: Fluke AC Non-Contact Voltage Detector Pen 1000V AC
description: Detects AC voltage through insulation without requiring contact to the bare conductor.

title: LAP 13A 1G to 2G Switched Converter Socket White
description: Ideal for places where extra outlets are required. Suitable for flush-mounted boxes.

title: Mira Atom ERD Rear-Fed Exposed Chrome Thermostatic Mixer Shower
description: Thermostatic mixer shower with deluge head and separate hand shower. Separate temperature and flow controls enable fine tuning whilst showering. Magni-flow technology gives powerful performance and delivers high flow rate, even at low pressure. Thermostatic shower stability helps to ensure safe showering for all the family and Coolshield ensures the valve does not get hot.

title: Semi-Framed Silver / Clear Radius Edge Bathscreen 780mm x 1400mm
description: Slimline glass bath screen with simple design and classic shape. Toughened safety glass and adjustable profile. Fits standard flat-edged baths and includes a high quality seal for use between screen and bath. A great addition to any bathroom.

title: Toilet-to-Go Close-Coupled Toilet Dual-Flush 6Ltr
description: Modern design. Vitreous china.

title: Sylvania StartEco LED Ceiling Light White 12W 1025lm
description: Metal and plastic. Traditional design. Produces an even and uniform light distribution with a halo lighting effect on the wall surface. An ideal solution for bathrooms.

title: Swirl Divine Tap Chrome
description: Divine mono mixer kitchen tap. Chrome-plated brass.

title: Self-Closing Non-Concussive Bathroom Basin Taps Chrome
description: ½". Chrome-plated brass. Turns off automatically after approximately 9-13 seconds depending on water pressure.

title: BlueDry Eco Dry High Speed Hand Dryer Brushed Steel 0.55-1.8kW
description: Eco hand dryer with a high speed vacuum motor which dries the hands in 12 seconds. Optional heater element saves energy and money. Vandal-resistant due to a seamless, sturdy shell. Blue LED light guides the user to the airflow and adds a cool modern touch. Stainless steel construction.

title: Armitage Shanks Sanura Wall-Mounted Top Inlet Urinal White 390mm x 305mm x 500mm
description: The contemporary design of this wall-mounted top inlet urinal lends itself to a wide range of commercial installations. Supplied with top inlet spreader, domed waste, bottle trap and hangers.

title: Cooke & Lewis CSB60A Built- In Single Electric Oven Stainless Steel 595mm x 595mm
description: Conventional single electric oven with hard wired cable connection, twin grill and double-glazed door. Designed to protect from overheating. Features 4 functions including grilling and plate warming. Includes baking tray, trivet and shelf. Stainless steel finish.

title: Cooke & Lewis CLIHS60 Integrated Cooker Hood 600mm Grey
description: Helps to remove cooking odours and illuminates the cooking area.

title: Titan TTL758CHN 2000W 230V Electric 40cm Chainsaw
description: Electric chainsaw with powerful motor and automatic chain lubrication. Chain brake activates in less than 0.1 seconds for added operator safety. Suitable for cutting firewood.

title: Titan TTBVP25-2 25.4cc 2-Stroke Blower Vac
description: Lightweight, compact blower vacuum for clearing and cleaning ground with minimum effort. Dry leaves can be crushed to 1/12 of original size. Offers blowing, vacuuming and mulching functions. Features throttle with cruise control and Easy-Start technology, reducing the pulling effort required for starting.

title: Roughneck Fibreglass Post-Hole Digger
description: For speedy removal of soil. Fibreglass handles with knuckle protectors. Large capacity digging bucket.

title: Timbadeck  PZ Double-Countersunk Decking Screws 4.5mm x 65mm 500 Pack
description: PZ. Single thread, carbon steel decking screws. Organic coating. Partially threaded.

title: Roughneck Landscaping Rake 914mm
description: Lightweight and rustproof aluminium rake. Ideal for raking bark, wood chippings, leaf mulch, pea gravels and other landscaping tasks. Fibreglass handle. 8mm teeth with 15mm gaps.

title: Roughneck 5lb Mattock 36"
description: High density fibreglass handle, horizontal and vertical chisels and blades for chopping, cutting and grubbing-out ground.

title: Hozelock 2-in-1 Reel with Hose 25m
description: Floor-standing or wall-mounted. Metal/plastic construction with soft-grip handle and manual layering system. ½" fittings and accessories included.

title: White / Black Pressure Sprayer 5Ltr
description: Pressure sprayer suitable for a variety of gardening applications.

title: Yardmaster 6' x 4' (Nominal) Apex Metal Shed Green
description: Hot-dipped galvanised steel.

title: Forest 6' x 4' (Nominal) Pent Overlap Timber Shed
description: A great storage solution for all types of gardening equipment, from tools to lawnmowers. Pent roof and windows allow plenty of room and light. Roof style is perfect for situating against a back wall or fence. Design features small sections, making it easier to handle and quick and easy to assemble. Overlapped, straight-cut boards allowing for natural movement of the timber so it can adapt to the changing weather conditions and ensure rainwater run-off. Pressure-treated solid timber floor allows for the storage of heavier items like lawnmowers or bags of compost. The shed door is braced with double 'Z' framing for rigidity and is hung with secure hidden hinges. Fitted with a hasp and staple latch that can be padlocked (padlock not included). The 2 fixed windows are made from shatterproof PET glazing, which will not yellow or brittle over time. The door can also be hinged either side of the opening to suit the garden. The dip treatment that has been applied at the factory protects the timber (annual treatment required). Manufactured in the UK and supplied with felt and all fixtures and fittings needed to build.

title: TurboGold PZ Double-Countersunk Woodscrews Trade Grab Pack 1000 Pcs
description: Everything you need in a single thread multipurpose screw: top quality, durability and terrific driving - it's shaped to drive fast! The choice of the professional. Our premium PZ multipurpose screw. Suitable for screwdrivers, combi drills and impact drivers.

title: Easydrive PZ Countersunk Woodscrews Trade Pack 1000 Pcs
description: Heat-treated for snap-resistance, PZ recess designed to reduce cam-out.

title: Rawlplug R-KEM II Styrene-Free Polyester Resin 300ml
description: Low odour bonded anchor suitable for solid and hollow substrates. Suitable for repetitive use in confined spaces and can be used in water-filled holes (except sea water). For use with standard silicone gun. Supplied with 2 x nozzles.

title: Easydrive TX Countersunk Concrete Screws 7.5mm x 100mm 100 Pack
description: Ideal for fixing uPVC and timber frames directly to masonry.

title: Easyfix Steel Large Flat Washers M6 x 1.6mm 100 Pack
description: BZP. For thin workpieces and sensitive surfaces. Suitable for metric screws.

title: Easyfix Bright Zinc-Plated Mixed Bolts, Nuts & Washers Pack 500 Piece Set
description: Bright zinc-plated.

title: Paslode Bright IM350 Collated Nails 3.1mm x 90mm 2200 Pack
description: Galvanised, patented Pro-Strip collation won't rot or deteriorate. Comes complete with 2 fuel cells. Use with IM350 Gas Framing Nail Gun.

title: Paslode Galvanised-Plus IM360 Collated Nails 3.1mm x 90mm 2200 Pack
description: Galvanised-plus, angled collated nails. Comes complete with 2 fuel cells. Use with Paslode IM360ci.

title: DeWalt DCK264P2T-GB 18V 2 x 5.0Ah Li-Ion XR Brushless Cordless Twin Pack Nailer Kit
description: Brushless framing / finish nailer twin kit for professional roofers and carpenters. 18V XR 2-speed framing nailer, with its ergonomic design, has a sequential operating mode to ensure precision placement. The dry fire lockout ensures that the tool is protected from firing if there are no nails in the magazine. Compact 16G finish nailer has a maximum torque of 107Nm to drive in nails more easily.

title: Screw-Tite 2 PZ Double-Countersunk Trade Pack 1200 Pcs
description: Acute tri-lock threadform, PZ recess, multipurpose screw. Enhanced dual start with opposing thread gives an easy, straight drive. Dowel ream reduces timber splitting. Trade pack of eight boxes containing one free Stick-Tite bit per box.

title: Swann Enforcer SWDVK-846854MQB-EU 64GB SD CardGB 8-Channel 1080p DVR CCTV Kit & 4 Indoor & Outdoor Cameras
description: Heat and motion-based activity triggers red and blue flashing lights and bright spotlights to intimidate intruders and prevent crime. Activity can trigger push notifications and recording, with microphones to provide live and recorded audio capture. Features Night2Day for colour video at any hour, powerful infrared night vision up to 30m and TrueDetect for heat and motion detection. Video can be watched live or via playback using the Swann Security app on a smart device. Weatherproof camera designed to withstand the elements.

title: Swann Pro Enforcer SWNVK-879904-EU 2TB HDDGB 8-Channel 4K NVR CCTV Kit & 4 Indoor & Outdoor Cameras
description: Heat and motion-based activity triggers red and blue flashing lights, spotlights and sirens to intimidate intruders and prevent crime. Activity can trigger mobile alerts. Features 4K ultra HD video for details such as faces, licence plates and close ups. With infrared night vision up to 40m and Night2Day technology, which provides colour video at night up to 10m or black and white video up to 40m in darkness (with spotlights on). Everythinig can be viewed using Swann Security app.

title: Zinc DION Outdoor Black PIR Sensor 180°
description: Polycarbonate. Wall-mounted PIR motion sensor with 180° detection range. Can be used for wall lights, ground lights, porches and garages. Time delay from 10 seconds to 7 minutes.

title: CED Indoor & Outdoor Black Body & Opal Head Photocell Standalone Sensor
description: Polycarbonate.

title: Master Lock Water-Resistant Combination 5-Key Safe
description: Wall-mounted select access key box with 4-digit combination for keyless convenience and increased security. Shutter door protects combination dials from weather, dirt and grime. Ideal key safe for families with children who may need to enter the house without an adult. Compact, lightweight design. Mounting kit included.

title: Squire Steel Water-Resistant  Combination  Padlock Blue 50mm
description: 48mm steel body with hardened steel shackle. Recodeable with 10,000 combinations.

title: Hafele Steel 110° Soft-Close Clip-On Concealed Hinges 64mm 20 Pack
description: Nickel-plated with full overlay and automatic closing. For door thickness 14-22mm.

title: Eclipse Satin Chrome Grade 11 Fire Rated Ball Bearing Hinges 102mm x 76mm 3 Pack
description: Steel construction. Suitable for 60 minute fire doors.

title: Henderson Pocket Door PDK3 1-Door Sliding Track System Silver 1449mm
description: Space-saving solution that allows a sliding door to effortlessly slide into a cavity wall, ensuring it is completely hidden from view when not in use. Kit comes complete with timber cavity frame, pre-assembled aluminium track and header mechanism and also a satin flush pull set. Finished wall thickness is 120mm. For bi-parting doors, 2 kits can be purchased.

title: Mila LH/RH ProLinea Espagnolette uPVC Window Handle White
description: Universal espagnolette window handle supplied with a choice of 5 clip-in spindle lengths (9mm, 15mm, 30mm, 43mm and 55mm). Rose conceals an internal 90° stop to prevent gearbox over-stressing. Colour-matched, edge-to-edge screw cap covers the whole of the rose, resulting in minimal, modern sight lines. Push-button assembly and finger grips for user ease and comfort. Manufactured from high performance zinc alloy.

title: Spacepro Classic 3-Door Sliding Wardrobe Door Kit Cashmere Frame Cashmere / Mirror Panel 2216mm x 2260mm
description: Space-saving, contemporary style sliding door kit. Easy to fit in just a few hours. May be combined with an interior storage system kit. Designed for single-sided use only and not intended for walk through applications. Can go from wall-to-wall or can go from a wall to an end panel.

title: Gliderol 7' 1" x 7' Insulated Aluminium Electric Roller Garage Door Golden Oak
description: Insulated garage door with all-round weather protection and remote control operation. Rolls up vertically and does not swing out in front of the garage. Enables parking right up to the door and delivers more storage space in the roof of the garage. Features anti-drop safety device and 2 remote handsets.

title: Keylite  Manual Centre-Pivot White Painted Timber Roof Window Clear 780mm x 980mm
description: Centre-pivot roof window ideal for use in kitchens and bathrooms, with an integrated expanding thermal collar, warm edge glazing and streamlined fit as standard. Conveniently placed opening handle at the top of the window helps to control ventilation, giving the option of fresh air flow even when the window is locked and secure. Suitable for single or multiple applications in any roof with a pitch of 15-90˚. Glass, pine and aluminium construction.

title: Dorgard LL800 Hold-Open Fire Door Retainer Black
description: Reliable choice for retaining fire doors, keeps the door open at any angle. Automatically releases door when fire alarm sounds. Easy to fit. Long life C batteries supplied. Suitable for holding open units up to 1600mm.

title: Gliderol 7' 9" x 7' Insulated Aluminium Electric Roller Garage Door Anthracite Grey
description: Insulated garage door with all-round weather protection and remote control operation. Rolls up vertically and does not swing out in front of the garage. Enables parking right up to the door and delivers more storage space in the roof of the garage. Features anti-drop safety device and 2 remote handsets.

title: SuperFOIL Insulation Garage Door Insulation Kit 0.6m x 10m
description: Designed to keep garages warmer in winter and cooler in summer. 2 reflective foil surfaces provide a radiant barrier, reflecting heat back to either prevent heat loss during winter or stop overheating in the summer. LDPE bubble membrane core provides insulation and slows the transfer of heat. Suitable for any garage door type, fitting both automatic and manual mechanisms. Supplied with 25mm wide double-sided adhesive tape and a roll of aluminium foil tape. Quick and easy to install.

title: Manthorpe Access Panel White 243mm x 193mm x 16mm
description: For access to hidden stopcocks and fuse boards in cavity walls. Requires an opening 150mm x 200mm for fitting.

title: Spacepro 3-Door Sliding Wardrobe Door Kit White Frame White / Mirror Panel 2592mm x 2260mm
description: Mirrorred panels and white frame with matching track set thats lightweight and smooth running. Ideal space-saving solution.

title: Henderson Pocket Door PDK3 1-Door Sliding Track System Silver 1449mm
description: Space-saving solution that allows a sliding door to effortlessly slide into a cavity wall, ensuring it is completely hidden from view when not in use. Kit comes complete with timber cavity frame, pre-assembled aluminium track and header mechanism and also a satin flush pull set. Finished wall thickness is 120mm. For bi-parting doors, 2 kits can be purchased.

title: Greenhurst Deluxe Door Canopy White 1320mm x 630mm x 1260mm
description: Made from a blend of engineering polymers to make a composite material, widely used in architectural features. High strength to weight ratio and will not deteriorate due to weather in the way timber does. Designed to fit over a standard-width UK front door. Supplied ready-decorated and is protected with a UV-stable coat to prevent colour fading from sunlight. Wall fixings and drill bit included.

title: DeWalt Bolster Safety Boots Honey Size 9
description: 100% leather upper with ankle support. Padded collar and tongue.

title: DeWalt Phoenix Safety Boots Tan Size 9
description: Waterproof safety boot with leather and mesh upper. Padded collar and tongue for all-day comfort. Features ankle and TPU heel support.

title: Site Kirksey Stretch Holster Trousers Grey / Black 34" W 30" L
description: Stretch holster trousers feature triple stitching for durability in tough working conditions. Multiple pockets include top-loading knee pad inserts and easy-access holster pockets.

title: DeWalt Wilmington Jacket Black Large 48" Chest
description: Water-resistant, waxed jacket with reinforced shoulders and elbows to increase durability. Angled chest pockets, and lower front pockets, with concealed popper fastening. Storm flap and adjustable cuffs.

title: Bosch GHH 12+18V XA 12 / 18V Li-Ion Airstream Heated Hoodie Black Large 41" Chest - Bare
description: Ideal for use as a mid-layer option to counter cold temperatures and bad weather. Can be combined with a thin, wind-resistant and waterproof jacket to keep warm. Features 3 heating zones and 3 heat levels for even heat distribution and long-lasting warmth. With 12V battery adaptor with integrated port for charging USB-powered devices.

title: Scruffs Trade Womens Work Body Warmer Black Size 10
description: Lightweight, slim-fitting body warmer with Insatherm padding. Hardwearing nylon fabric for long lasting durability. Softshell panels for flexibility and comfort.

title: Site 320 Nitrile Foam Coated Gloves Red / Black Large
description: Breathable, nitrile foam-coated gloves with comfortable nylon and spandex blend liner. Developed for high dexterity when precision handling is required. Offers excellent grip in dry, wet and oily conditions.

title: JSP Force 8 Medium Mask Respirator with Press-to-Check Filters P3
description: Twin cartridge half-mask with Typhoon valve provides superior low breathing resistance. Features a fully adjustable, 4-point cradle suspension harness with quick-release buckles, ensuring an effective fit. Durable thermoplastic rubber for a superior fit to most face shapes. Reflective strips create increased visibility in low light environments for added safety. Press-To-Check filters instantly verify the correct seal.

title: Scafftag Ladder Tag Kit
description: A must for all ladders, kicksteps and podiums. Helps eliminate accidents and improve your inspection management process.

title: Firechief FAP1 Dry Powder Fire Extinguisher 1kg
description: Multi-purpose fire extinguisher designed to fight most small household, garage and workshop risks. Includes bracket and pressure gauge.

title: No Nonsense Sanitary Silicone White 310ml
description: High performance acetoxy silicone for sealing around baths, showers, basins and sanitary ware. Provides a watertight flexible seal with anti-fungal properties. Fast curing, UV-resistant.

title: No Nonsense General Purpose Silicone Clear 310ml 12 Pack
description: Fast curing, acetoxy silicone for a permanent watertight and flexible seal. Good adhesion properties. Suitable for sealing glass, aluminium, painted surfaces, sanitaryware, ceramics and non-porous surfaces. Weatherproof, anti-fungal and UV-resistant.

title: Soudal Fix All High Tack Adhesive & Sealant White 290ml
description: Ultimate strength, anti-mould adhesive and sealant. Extremely strong initial grab that holds firm after one second. High Tack can be used in all weather conditions for interior and exterior bonding on most surfaces. Can also be painted.

title: OB1 Multi-Surface Sealant & Adhesive Clear 290ml
description: User-friendly, hybrid polymer formulation for the ultimate in bonding and sealing. An alternative to mastics, wood and PU adhesives, silicones, acrylics and butyl rubber sealants. Contains no solvents so will never crack or shrink. Can be applied on wet surfaces, painted or moulded. Very high bond strength with resistance to fungal and bacterial growth.

title: No Nonsense Decorators Caulk White 310ml
description: Water-based, single-component, flexible acrylic filler. Ideal for use around skirting boards, ceilings and architraves. Dries quickly and is paintable in 1-2 hours. Suitable with most types of paint.

title: Geocel Painters Mate Flexible Acrylic Filler White 310ml
description: Flexible acrylic filler for use on most materials. Paintable within 1 hour. Contains fungicide. For interior or exterior use.

title: No Nonsense Sealant Gun
description: High quality manual applicator gun for the application of 310 and 400ml cartridges of acrylics, silicones, MS polymers and adhesives.

title: No Nonsense Foam Applicator Gun
description: Professional, metal PU foam gun with metal fitting and flow adjustment screw. Ergonomically designed handle for ease of use. Standard screw thread for any gun foam type.

title: Vitrex All-in-One Sealant Remover & Profiler Kit 35mm
description: Silicone Remover and Finisher all-in-one sealant remover and profiler kit easily removes old silicone from corners and flat surfaces for a professional looking finish. Includes a choice of profiles for neatening unset silicone. Tools can be wiped clean after use. Peel off waste when set.

title: No Nonsense Sealant Remover 100ml
description: Effective gel formulation for the removal of cured acrylic and silicone sealant residue. Works on a range of non-porous surfaces.
